description: Drone is a Continuous Delivery platform built on Docker, written in Go.  This is the drone-agent; you MUST install the drone-server first.
name: drone-agent
postInstallNotes:
Drone CI on DCOS successfully installed.
.
preInstallNotes: This DC/OS Service is currently EXPERIMENTAL. There may be bugs, incomplete features, incorrect documentation, or other discrepancies. Experimental packages should never be used in production!
